Languages.string: any one language (usually Common) plus thieves' cant

MonsterTrait.Name: Cunning Action
MonsterTrait.Text: On each of its turns, the thief can use a bonus action to take the Dash, Disengage, or Hide action.

MonsterTrait.Name: Evasion
MonsterTrait.Text: If the thief is subjected to an effect that allows it to make a Dexterity saving throw to take only half damage, the thief instead takes no damage if it succeeds on the saving throw, and only half damage if it fails.

MonsterTrait.Name: Sneak Attack (1/Turn)
MonsterTrait.Text: The thief deals an extra 14 (4d6) damage when it hits a target with a weapon attack and has advantage on the attack roll, or when the target is within 5 feet of an ally of the thief that isn’t incapacitated and the thief doesn’t have disadvantage on the attack roll.

MonsterTrait.Name: Multiattack
MonsterTrait.Text: The thief makes three attacks with its shortsword.

MonsterAction.Name: Shortsword
MonsterAction.Text: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d6+4) piercing damage.

MonsterAction.Name: Light Crossbow
MonsterAction.Text: Ranged Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, range 80/320 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (1d8+4) piercing damage.

MonsterTrait.Name: Uncanny Dodge
MonsterTrait.Text: The thief halves the damage that it takes from an attack that hits it. The thief must be able to see the attacker.
